t:
My wife was murdered the same day my autistic son spoke his first word.



When the police forcefully questioned him, he said, “Daddy.”
c:
My son just accidentally framed me. Or, did he?



#wife #murder #autism #son #speak #frame #accident #father





Hints: It's possible that I or my son did the murder. It's possible that my son accidentally or intentionally framed me.

Autism is a developmental disorder characterized by difficulties with social interaction and communication, and by restricted and repetitive behavior. Autistic children may have delayed speech development but can be better at certain tasks than normal people.
